name: as3ToTypescript
description: convert as3 code base to typescript

scripts.test: node test/runner generate && node test/runner compare
scripts.compile: tsc --module 'commonjs' --outDir lib --target es5 src/declarations/node.d.ts src/main/parser.ts src/main/emitter.ts src/main/command.ts
scripts.watch: tsc --module 'commonjs' --outDir lib --target es5 --watch src/declarations/node.d.ts src/main/parser.ts src/main/emitter.ts src/main/command.ts

author: Fran√ßois de Campredon
